moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.effect: Has a small chance of lowering the target’s Sp. Def.

moves.name: Dire Hit +
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s critical-hit rate.

moves.name: Phantom Force
moves.effect: The user takes on a phantom presence. After a set time, this presence fades and the user attacks. No other actions can be taken while in phantom presence. Opponents’ moves will not hit the user while it is in this presence. If the user is hit by a sync move while in phantom presence, the presence will fade.

moves.name: Pierce the Veil!
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Attack. Substantially raises the user’s Attack if the user is affected by a status condition. Raises the user’s Sp. Atk and evasiveness. Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk and evasiveness if the user is affected by a status condition.

passives.name: Shook 2
passives.description: Sharply raises the user’s Speed when the user’s HP drops to half or below for the first time in a battle.

passives.name: Last Word
passives.description: The Pokémon uses Explosion immediately before fainting.

passives.name: Benefactor
passives.description: Transfers this sync pair’s stat increases to the sync pair that will switch in when this sync pair switches out.

grid.bonus: Shadow Ball:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Dire Hit +:MP Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Phantom Force:MP Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Phantom Force:MP Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Pierce the Veil!:MP Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Mad Strength 2- Has a moderate chance of raising the Pokémon’s Attack when one of its attacks is successful.
Gritty 5- Powers up moves if the Pokémon is affected by a status condition.
Power Flux 3- The fuller the move gauge, the more this powers up moves.
Special Reserves 2- Once per battle, sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk when in a pinch.
Blind Spot- The more the user’s evasiveness has been raised, the more it powers up sync moves.
Shifty Striker 1- Has a small chance of raising the user’s evasiveness when the user’s Pokémon uses a move.
Pressure Cooker 9- Once per battle, reduces the user’s sync move countdown by one when in a pinch.
Demoralize 1- Lowers the Attack of all opposing sync pairs after using a sync move.
